cause.description:
Help innocent kittens get off the streets and into proper shelters and homes so they have a chance of survival out there!
1. Spay or Neuter your cats to help reduce the number of kittens yearly!
2. Adopt a kitten from your local shelter or rescue group
cause.mission: Get innocent kittens off the streets!
cause.name: O.o...Help Homeless Kittens...o.O
